name: whoreson
content:
an insult used to refer to or address a man who is considered to be unpleasant or of no worth: He said, "Well fought, brother! You gave that whoreson a surprise". [ as form of address ] Draw, you whoreson!
More examplesFewer examplesShakespeare's male characters often call one another "whoresons".I told him he was a no-good whoreson and he shouldn't have wasted my time in the first place.Those whoresons have twice as many archers as us.You whoreson dog!
